div.p: Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â

span.big: CollaboratorÂ - Working with others to achieve a common goal.
Global Citizen - Finding my role in the world to make it fair, equitable, and sustainable.
Empowered Learner - Taking an active role in choosing, demonstrating, and evaluating learning goals to master key skills and competencies.
Communicator - Engaging diverse audiences through respectful dialogue using print and digital media appropriately.Â
Innovator - Seeking out a problem and creatingÂ a unique, realistic solution based on research and/or experiences.
